#version 450

layout(points) in;
layout(line_strip, max_vertices = 2) out;
in vec3 in_normal[1];
out vec3 out_color;
void main(){
	
	gl_Position = gl_in[0].gl_Position;
	out_color = in_normal[0];
	EmitVertex();
	
	
	gl_Position = gl_in[0].gl_Position+vec4(in_normal[0], 1.0);
	out_color = in_normal[0];
	EmitVertex();
	EndPrimitive();
}
